snippet.title: Mystery Trackers: Raincliff
snippet.description:
iPad: http://bigfi.sh/1gbZbd3
iPhone: http://bigfi.sh/R6foLq

Your next assignment with the Mystery Trackers is in Raincliff, an abandoned town with a mysterious past. You're charged with investigating the recent disappearance of a group of students. 

• OVERCOME THE UNEXPLAINABLE! 
You'll quickly find that you aren't alone in Raincliff. Phantoms live there and they want the town's secrets to stay hidden. 

• WHAT'S HAPPENED TO THE STUDENTS? 
A group of students and their bus driver have vanished after launching their own investigation of Raincliff. Solve the mystery and save the students. 

• EXPLORE THE TOWN OF RAINCLIFF 
At the beginning of your journey much of Raincliff will be locked away from you. As you uncover secrets and begin to solve the mystery of this haunted town, more and more of it will open up for you. 

• UNLOCK THE MYSTERY IN THIS MAGNIFICENT COLLECTOR'S EDITION! 
Find the adorable frogs that are hidden throughout your game. Uncover even more secrets in the bonus game and download the wonderful wallpapers in this fantastic Hidden Objects Adventure Game. 

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!
